name: CTCellularPlanProvisioning
desc: An object you use to download and install a carrier eSIM.

items.name: func supportsCellularPlan() -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the device supports eSIM.

items.name: func addPlan(with: CTCellularPlanProvisioningRequest, completionHandler: (CTCellularPlanProvisioningAddPlanResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Starts the provisioning process for a specified eSIM.

items.name: enum CTCellularPlanProvisioningAddPlanResult
items.desc: The result from attempting to provision an eSIM.
